official_title: To suspend, until January 1, 1997, the duty on N,N-dimethyl-N'-(3-((methylamino)carbonyl)oxy)phenyl) methanimidamide monohydrochloride.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1996, the duty on n,n-dimethyl-n'(3-((methylamino)-carbonyl)oxy)-phenyl)-methanimidamide monohydrochloride.

titles.title: To suspend, until January 1, 1997, the duty on N,N-dimethyl-N'-(3-((methylamino)carbonyl)oxy)phenyl) methanimidamide monohydrochloride.
